text: Today we're learning English with The Tourist.

A British woman, Elise Clifton-Ward (Angelina 
Jolie), is being followed by British police

through downtown Paris because they're trying to 
locate Alexander Pearce, Elise's criminal lover.

In the following scene, Elise receives a letter 
from Alexander, giving her some instructions to

throw off the police. Then, we'll see a scene 
where Elise meets Frank Tupelo (Johnny Depp).

But before we get into today's lesson and in case 
you're new here, I want to let you know that every

week we make three brand new lessons just for you 
to help you learn fast English without getting

lost, without missing the jokes and without 
subtitles. Just like jiwoo who says that

they have learned so much new vocabulary and our 
lessons are really fun. So make sure you hit that

subscribe button and the bell down below, that way 
you won't miss a single one of our new lessons.
If you’re a fan of Angelina Jolie,

then I highly recommend you check out this 
lesson we made with her and Brad Pitt. You

click up here or down in the description 
box below to watch it after this lesson!
